GR14visvaksu:7385: tatsthānaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti grāmasya nidhanaṃ bhavet /
GR14visvaksu:7386: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena uktakāle tu cālayet // Vis_39.100 //
GR14visvaksu:7387: ayane viṣuve caiva saṃkrāntyāṃ grahaṇe tathā /
GR14visvaksu:7390: dvitīyāvaraṇādbāhye karmārcāṃ na tu cālayet // Vis_39.102 //
GR14visvaksu:7396: prāsādaṃ tu navaṃ kṛtvā pañcagavyena śodhayet // Vis_39.105 //
GR14visvaksu:7402: saṃsthāpya vidhivat pūrvaṃ punaḥ sthāpanamācaret // Vis_39.108 //
GR14visvaksu:7405: aśāstrīye mahādoṣān sarvān me brūhyaśeṣataḥ // Vis_39.109 //
GR14visvaksu:7411: sādhite kalaśe bhinne taddravyaiḥ pūrayet punaḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7420: etadeva phalaṃ prāha svayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Vis_39.116 //
GR14visvaksu:7422: yadi lobhena gṛhṇīyāt kākayoniśataṃ vrajet // Vis_39.117 //
GR14visvaksu:7424: gṛdhrayoniśataṃ gacchet tadante sūkaro bhavet // Vis_39.118 //
GR14visvaksu:7426: gṛdhrayoniśataṃ gacchet tadante kukkuṭo bhavet // Vis_39.119 //
GR14visvaksu:7428: dadhiyuktaṃ tu yat kṣīraṃ snāpayedyadi lobhataḥ // Vis_39.120 //
GR14visvaksu:7430: rasadravyaṃ ca vanyaistu niyujyānmākṣikaṃ naraḥ // Vis_39.121 //
GR14visvaksu:7434: dṛśyate sādhitaṃ caiva taddravyaṃ tu parityajet // Vis_39.123 //
GR14visvaksu:7435: tān sarvānna spṛśedyastu kalaśe sādhite punaḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7436: tathā vai dṛśyate cāpi tato 'nyāni ca vinyaset // Vis_39.124 //
GR14visvaksu:7438: parityajya tato 'nyāṃśca sādhayet kalaśān punaḥ // Vis_39.125 //
GR14visvaksu:7440: parityajya tato vidvān punaścānyaṃ tu vinyaset // Vis_39.126 //
GR14visvaksu:7441: duṣṭairhi vīkṣitaṃ caiva pādaspṛṣṭaṃ ca yadbhavet /
GR14visvaksu:7442: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ ca yajamānamathāpi vā // Vis_39.127 //
GR14visvaksu:7447: bādhante hyaniśaṃ hyete rājānaṃ rāṣṭrameva ca /
GR14visvaksu:7448: āḍhakaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tannyūnaṃ parivarjayet // Vis_39.130 //
GR14visvaksu:7453: yasmin rāṣṭre muniśreṣṭha snapanaṃ syāt kadācana /
GR14visvaksu:7456: snapanaṃ kārayedviṣṇoḥ bhūtimicchan parāṃ gatim // Vis_39.134 //
GR14visvaksu:7457: doṣāṇāṃ ca praśamanaṃ vyādhīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7458: grahāṇāṃ śāntaye caiva śatrūṇāṃ ca jayāya ca // Vis_39.135 //
GR14visvaksu:7460: kāmānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vṛddhaye sarvavarṇinām // Vis_39.136 //
GR14visvaksu:7462: mānahīnaṃ tu yaddravyaṃ pūjāhīnaṃ ca yadguroḥ // Vis_39.137 //
GR14visvaksu:7464: ābhicāraṃ(ro?) bhavet sadyo grāmasya nagarasya ca // Vis_39.138 //
GR14visvaksu:7469: ete cānye ca mucyante pāpebhyaḥ snapanena vai /
GR14visvaksu:7470: snapane hyadhikaṃ puṇyaṃ vidyate munisattama // Vis_39.141 //
GR14visvaksu:7472: snapanena tu tadviṣṇoḥ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Vis_39.142 //
GR14visvaksu:7474: apramāṇapaṭaṃ citraṃ vaiṇavaṃ daṇḍameva vā // Vis_39.143 //
GR14visvaksu:7476: varjitena kṛtaṃ cettanniṣphalaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // Vis_39.144 //
GR14visvaksu:7478: tatkumbhapatane caiva calane bhedane tathā // Vis_39.145 //
GR14visvaksu:7483: dhvaje lakṣaṇahīne tu garuḍe vā viśeṣataḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7484: kartṛbhartṛvināśaḥ syāt tatrastho narakaṃ vrajet // Vis_39.148 //
GR14visvaksu:7485: kṣipraṃ tyaktvā dhvajaṃ tatra ācāryeṇa samāhitaḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7494: patanādbhedane caiva dhvajaṃ tyaktvā tu tatkṣaṇāt // Vis_39.153 //
GR14visvaksu:7496: vāstuhomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.154 //
GR14visvaksu:7499: sa grāmo nidhanaṃ yāti tatrastho narakaṃ vrajet /
GR14visvaksu:7502: pūjayitvā tato devaṃ punargrāmaṃ paribhramet // Vis_39.157 //
GR14visvaksu:7505: etasminneva kāle tu velādīni na vīkṣayet /
GR14visvaksu:7510: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati // Vis_39.161 //
GR14visvaksu:7512: dhvajasya patane caiva prāyaścittaṃ pravakṣyate // Vis_39.162 //
GR14visvaksu:7514: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu brāhmaṇānatha bhojayet // Vis_39.163 //
GR14visvaksu:7518: snapanaṃ cottamaṃ kuryāt utsavaṃ ca vidhānataḥ // Vis_39.165 //
GR14visvaksu:7520: corairapahṛte caiva tadrāṣṭraṃ ca vinaśyati // Vis_39.166 //
GR14visvaksu:7522: balibhramaṇakāle tu nitye vā cotsave tu vā // Vis_39.167 //
GR14visvaksu:7524: śānti kṛtvā vidhānena pañcopaniṣadaiḥ kramāt // Vis_39.168 //
GR14visvaksu:7526: dravyābhāve tu caruṇā cākṣatairvā baliṃ dadet // Vis_39.169 //
GR14visvaksu:7528: śāntihomaṃ tu kṛtvaiva maṅgalāni ca darśayet // Vis_39.170 //
GR14visvaksu:7530: anālocya pradāne tu bimbahīne tu vā mune // Vis_39.171 //
GR14visvaksu:7534: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā bhojyā vai brāhṛmaṇāstrayaḥ // Vis_39.173 //
GR14visvaksu:7535: balibimbasya patane yāne vā bhūgate 'pi vā /
GR14visvaksu:7536: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti kartā bhartā tathaiva ca // Vis_39.174 //
GR14visvaksu:7538: śāntihomaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mahāpūjāpuraḥsaram // Vis_39.175 //
GR14visvaksu:7540: grāme vā nagare vāpi śeṣakarma samācaret // Vis_39.176 //
GR14visvaksu:7547: sthāpitaṃ pūrvavat kṛtvā asmin kālādi neṣyate /
GR14visvaksu:7550: patane cāṅgahīne ca prāyaścittaṃ tu pūrvavat // Vis_39.181 //
GR14visvaksu:7552: taistaireva tu kartavyāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāvasānakam (?) // Vis_39.182 //
GR14visvaksu:7554: tāḥ kriyā niṣphalāyānti tasmācchāntiṃ tu kārayet // Vis_39.183 //
GR14visvaksu:7563: yāgāgnau caiva vicchinne utsave vartite sati /
GR14visvaksu:7564: tadrāṣṭraṃ ca vinaśyanti(?) kartāro vyādhipīḍitāḥ // Vis_39.188 //
GR14visvaksu:7571: madhye kumbhagate deve hyutsave tu viśeṣataḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7572: niṣphalaḥ sa ca yāgastu kartāro vyādhipīḍitāḥ // Vis_39.192 //
GR14visvaksu:7575: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvā tu tasya doṣaḥ praśāmyati /
GR14visvaksu:7577: bhedane patane vedyāṃ prāyaścittaṃ tu pūrvavat /
GR14visvaksu:7578: aṣṭamaṅgalahīne tu pūjājīne tu tatra ca // Vis_39.195 //
GR14visvaksu:7598: ekakālaṃ bhavettasmin balikarma tu cenmune // Vis_39.205 //
GR14visvaksu:7601: dvikālaṃ tu muniśreṣṭha balidānaṃ tu kārayet /
GR14visvaksu:7610: aṅkurārpaṇapātraṃ tu naṣṭaṃ patitameva vā // Vis_39.211 //
GR14visvaksu:7612: śyāme rakte prarūḍhe vā daṇḍe(?) mūṣikabhakṣite // Vis_39.212 //
GR14visvaksu:7622: vighnitaṃ cet pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_39.217 //
GR14visvaksu:7626: kṛtvā tu vidhivat sarvaṃ paścāt paścātmakaṃ(?)kramāt // Vis_39.219 //
GR14visvaksu:7629: paribhramaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ homaṃ caiva tu kārayet /
GR14visvaksu:7633: snapanaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā tatra homaṃ tu pūrvavat /
GR14visvaksu:7634: kṛtvaivaṃ vidhivat sarvaṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret // Vis_39.223 //
GR14visvaksu:7637: ā(a?)sthāne vāmuhūrte vā sthāpanaṃ tu na kārayet /
GR14visvaksu:7638: sthāpanaṃ cenmahāmohāt kartā bhartā vinaśyati // Vis_39.225 //
GR14visvaksu:7640: yātrāṃ kṛtvā vidhānena punaḥ sthāpanamārabhet // Vis_39.226 //
GR14visvaksu:7642: vighnitā cetkriyā madhye prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate // Vis_39.227 //
GR14visvaksu:7646: tathaiva kārayet sarvaṃ rakṣitaṃ ceddinatrayam // Vis_39.229 //
GR14visvaksu:7648: aspṛśyasparśitaṃ vāpi bhinnaṃ vā mantrasāditam // Vis_39.230 //
GR14visvaksu:7650: uddhṛtaṃ brahmakumbhaṃ tu dūṣitaṃ patitaṃ tu vā // Vis_39.231 //
GR14visvaksu:7654: kṛtvā puṇyāhanirghoṣaṃ sthāpayet pūrvavat kramāt // Vis_39.233 //
GR14visvaksu:7656: vyatyāsaḥ kālahīnaṃ ca sphālitaṃ cādbhutaṃ tathā // Vis_39.234 //
GR14visvaksu:7660: ācāryasya tu tatkāle vakṣye saṃsthāpanakramam // Vis_39.236 //
GR14visvaksu:7663: pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena praṇavena tataḥ param /
GR14visvaksu:7666: tenaiva kārayet sarvaṃ mantranyāsādi pūrvavat // Vis_39.239 //
GR14visvaksu:7668: ācāryaṃ pūjayet paścāt puṣkalena dhanena ca // Vis_39.240 //
GR14visvaksu:7674: snapanaṃ kārayitvādau brāhmaṇānāṃ ca bhojanam // Vis_39.243 //
GR14visvaksu:7677: yathāvitaṃ tu deveśaṃ pūjayettu dine dine /
GR14visvaksu:7684: brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.248 //
GR14visvaksu:7698: pūjayedvarjyabimbaṃ tu yadi lobhācca mantravit // Vis_39.255 //
GR14visvaksu:7699: tatpūjā niṣphalaṃ yāti kartā bhartā vinaśyati /
GR14visvaksu:7702: madhyamaṃ vā muniśreṣṭha taddoṣasya nikṛntanam // Vis_39.257 //
GR14visvaksu:7704: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā puṇyāhaṃ vācayettataḥ // Vis_39.258 //
GR14visvaksu:7708: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti dharmamārgo vinaśyati // Vis_39.260 //
GR14visvaksu:7717: evaṃ cāpi na kṛtvā tu vartate kālalaṅghanam /
GR14visvaksu:7718: snapanaṃ mūrtihomaṃ ca maṇḍape cādhivāsanam // Vis_39.265 //
GR14visvaksu:7719: kṛtvā tu vidhivat samyak sthāpayedvidhivat kramāt /
GR14visvaksu:7720: ūrdhvaṃ tu vatsarāt kālo gataṃ cedvakṣyate 'dhunā // Vis_39.266 //
GR14visvaksu:7726: mūrtihomaṃ tathā śāntiṃ snapanaṃ cādhamottamam // Vis_39.269 //
GR14visvaksu:7734: kṛtvā tu vidhivat samyak sthāpanādikrameṇa hi // Vis_39.273 //
GR14visvaksu:7737: atra kiñci (kaści?) dviśeṣo 'sti vakṣyāmi śṛṇu suvrata /
GR14visvaksu:7743: vidyate yadi vāñchā cet pañcarātreṇa vārcanam /
GR14visvaksu:7748: saumyaṃ tu sāttvataṃ caiva tasmātsaumyaṃ viśiṣyate // Vis_39.280 //
GR14visvaksu:7754: hitvā raudravidhānaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ hitakāmyayā // Vis_39.283 //
GR14visvaksu:7756: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena hitvā raudraṃ tu tatkṣaṇāt // Vis_39.284 //
GR14visvaksu:7762: śaivaṃ ca śambhunā proktaṃ śuddhaṃ laiṅgamiti dvidhā // Vis_39.287 //
GR14visvaksu:7765: dine dine muniśreṣṭha laiṅgikaṃ na smaredbudhaḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7770: dine dine muniśreṣṭha nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vis_39.291 //
GR14visvaksu:7773: vaikhānasā iti proktāḥ ke te cātra vivakṣitāḥ // Vis_39.292 //
GR14visvaksu:7774: vānaprasthā dvidhā kiṃ te sūtā vā kiṃ vivakṣitāḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7782: saṃproktastu muniśreṣṭha iti śāstrasya niścayaḥ // Vis_39.296 //
GR14visvaksu:7788: tadanyadaivataṃ vipra manasāpi na kalpayet // Vis_39.299 //
GR14visvaksu:7789: yadi vā sthāpyate mohāddaṇḍyo vadhyaḥsa pāpabhāk /
GR14visvaksu:7790: sa kartā saṃkarasyāpi rājño rāṣṭrasya tasya hi // Vis_39.300 //
GR14visvaksu:7801: rāṣṭraṃ śarīraṃ rājastu rājā jīvaḥ sa ucyate /
GR14visvaksu:7802: rāṣṭrakṣaye kṣayo rājñaḥ tasmādrakṣyaṃ dvayaṃ budhaiḥ // Vis_39.306 //
GR14visvaksu:7803: caṇḍālatvaṃ gate loke vedāḥ sarve tirohitāḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7812: brahmā rudraśca śakraśca vasavo varuṇastathā // Vis_39.311 //
GR14visvaksu:7814: śaktayaśca tathā cānyāḥ sarvāḥ viṣṇuvibhūtayaḥ // Vis_39.312 //
GR14visvaksu:7815: tāśca sarvāḥ prasīdanti purā cārthārthināṃ nṛṇām /
GR14visvaksu:7822: tāntrikaṃ vaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tāntrikaṃ tu vā // Vis_39.316 //
GR14visvaksu:7827: vāstau bimbasya pūjāyāṃ pūjakasya ca saṃkaraḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7833: na tithirna ca nakṣatraṃ kālavelā na vidyate /
GR14visvaksu:7834: saṃkaraṃ tayajyate kṣipraṃ sarvaprāṇihitāya vai // Vis_39.321 //
GR14visvaksu:7835: sadya eva tu kartavyā saṃkarasya tu niṣkṛtiḥ /
GR14visvaksu:7838: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ samācaret // Vis_39.323 //
GR14visvaksu:7844: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā snapanaṃ sādhakottamaḥ // Vis_39.326 //
GR14visvaksu:7845: śāntihomaṃ kramāt kṛtvā vāstuhomaṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14visvaksu:7850: tattvanyāsaṃ kramāt kṛtvā sṛṣṭinyāsaṃ tathaiva ca // Vis_39.329 //
GR14visvaksu:7852: pūjayet satataṃ paścāt pūrvoktena vidhānataḥ // Vis_39.330 //
GR14visvaksu:7856: tantrāntareṇa deveśaṃ kadācinna tu pūjayet // Vis_39.332 //
GR14visvaksu:7860: pūrvaṃ karmārcanādīnāṃ śuddhasnānaṃ tu kārayet // Vis_39.334 //
GR14visvaksu:7864: ekāhaṃ vā tryahaṃ vātha saptāhaṃ vā munīśvara // Vis_39.336 //
GR14visvaksu:7866: etat krameṇa kartavyaṃ dvādaśābdāntameva ca // Vis_39.337 //
GR14visvaksu:7867: ekābde rakṣasāṃ sthānaṃ (vāsaḥ?) tasmācchāntiṃ tu kāreyat /
GR14visvaksu:7868: dvyabde ca yakṣavāsastu tryabde bhūtasaṃkulam // Vis_39.338 //
GR14visvaksu:7871: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ tu kārayet /
GR14visvaksu:7872: dvādaśābdāt purā kuryāt jalasaṃprokṣaṇena tu // Vis_39.340 //
GR14visvaksu:7874: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāyaścittaṃ tu nārada // Vis_39.341 //
GR14visvaksu:7882: godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ vastrameva ca // Vis_39.345 //
GR14visvaksu:7888: etat krameṇa kartavyaṃ śatavarṣāntameva ca // Vis_39.348 //
GR14visvaksu:7890: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti tatrasthā narakaṃ vrajet(?) // Vis_39.349 //
GR14visvaksu:7891: tadgrāmaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti tasmācchāntiṃ tu kārayet /
GR14visvaksu:7892: śāntiṃ kṛtvā vidhānena pañcarātreṇa pūjayet // Vis_39.350 //
GR14visvaksu:7894: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣipraṃ śāntiṃ samācaret // Vis_39.351 //
